text: atah jab inakaar karanevaalo se tumhaaree muthabhed ho to (unakee) garadanen maarana hai, yahaan tak ki jab unhen achchhee tarah kuchal do to bandhanon mein jakado, phir baad mein ya to ehasaan karo ya fidaya (arth-dand) ka maamala karo, yahaan tak ki yuddh apane bojh utaarakar rakh de. yah bhalee-bhaanti samajh lo, yadi allaah chaahe to svayan unase nipat le. kintu (usane ya aadesh isalie diya) taaki tumhaaree ek-doosare kee pareeksha le. aur jo log allaah ke maarg mein maare jaate hai unake karm vah kadaapi akaarath na karega
